label.check_out_project: Check out the projects the owner is working on.
label.registering_project_mess: Complete your project registration and get a free consultation!
label.in_progress_project_mess: I have a project in progress.
label.this_is_a_list_saved_project: This is a list of temporarily saved projects.
label.write_project_content: You can write the project contents continuously by clicking the [Continue Registration] button.
label.no_project: There are no registered projects yet.
label.register_project_together: Register a project and come up to build a happy building together!
label.register_project_header2: Let's go up and join us for a fun construction.
label.additional_information_desc: If you have any additional information, please write.
label.local_architect: Do you prefer a local architect?
label.detail_request_desc:
Please feel free to write any detailed requests.
Your detailed request will also be forwarded to the architects participating in the bid.
label.project_register_success_title: Project registration has been successfully completed.
label.project_register_success_sub: We will help you build a happy building with Olla.
label.vr_architecture_header:
Through Olaman's VR architecture,
Complete your own VR architecture portfolio!
label.vr_architecture_question_1: How can I create a VR architecture portfolio?
label.vr_architecture_question_3: How can I win an order with the VR architecture portfolio?
label.vr_architecture_content_1: In order to create a VR architecture portfolio, you need to deliver the drawing information and 3D modeling* information of the representative building you want to make into the portfolio.
label.vr_architecture_content_2_1: The VR architecture portfolio provided by Ola
label.vr_architecture_content_2_3: for one representative building per company.
label.vr_architecture_content_2_4: Realize your partner's representative building in a virtual space and become more competitive.
label.vr_architecture_content_3:
The created VR architecture portfolio is exposed on the VR architecture map serviced by OLLA.
If you see your partner's VR architecture directly on the VR architecture map and like it, you can request it directly.
label.vr_architecture_note_1: *3D modeling is possible with 3D modeling objects made with your tools such as Sketch Up, Rhyno, and 3D Max.
label.vr_architecture_note_2: * If you want to create an additional VR building in addition to the one provided for free, a separate cost will be incurred. For further inquiries, please contact Olla.
label.delete_register_file: Are you sure you want to delete the registered file?
label.building_drawings_title: You must submit a drawing of the building you wish to create VR architecture for.
label.building_drawings_content: Please submit the drawing of the building as a CAD file. You must submit an electrical drawing and a facility drawing along with the basic building floor plan, elevation view, and sectional drawing so that the VR building in the form the architect wants can be accurately produced during VR production. When submitting a file, please compress the drawing file and submit it.
label.3d_modeling_title: Please submit the 3D modeled file for VR architecture production.
label.3d_modeling_content: If you have a modeling file created by the architect using tools such as Google Skectup, Rhyno, 3D Max, etc., please send it to ola so that the desired VR architecture can be expressed more accurately.
label.reset_password_mgs: *Please enter the email account for which you want to reset your password.
label.text_message_notification_talk: Text Message & Kakao Talk Notification Talk
label.withdrawal_mgs_1: Upon withdrawal, including the project registered by the owner
label.withdrawal_mgs_1a: all information stored in the account will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
label.withdrawal_mgs_2: If you cancel your membership, you will not be able to rejoin the account you have withdrawn.
label.withdrawal_mgs_3: If there is VR architecture content provided through the OLLA service, it is not possible to set whether the content can be opened or not, and it may be made public.
label.withdrawal_mgs_4: All other activity histories within the service are deleted and cannot be recovered.
label.withdrawal_mgs_5: If you agree to the above and wish to withdraw, please click the “Agree” button below.
label.how_to_use_partner_question: Curious about how to use an architect/construction company?
label.create_project_title:
Are you planning to build?
A project to Ola, an architectural planner using virtual space
Register for free and find an architect.
label.create_project_subtitle: If you are looking for an architect for architectural design, please register your project. Various architects participate in the bidding. You can register a project and request a bid through simple information registration. The project contents can be revised and supplemented through a pre-meeting, so please write them comfortably.
label.pre_meeting_title:
If you enter the project contents, in Olla
We will consult with you to confirm the requirements of the building owner.
label.pre_meeting_subtitle:
After uploading the information you entered, the planner will discuss it according to the situation of the owner, such as the current state, budget, and design requirements.
After the consultation is completed, architects will be able to participate in the bidding.
label.recruitment_bidders_title:
After the project bidding begins
Find an architect you like.
label.recruitment_bidders_subtitle:
After registering a project, consulting and bidding begins, various architects' offices participate in bidding.
Look at the portfolios of the architects who participated in the bid and the information you entered, and check if there is an architect office you like.
If there is a project that architects have done through Ola, you can experience it for yourself with VR architecture.
label.design_meeting_title:
Did you find an architect you like?
Then, talk directly with the architect through the meeting request!
label.design_meeting_subtitle:
Requests for meetings can be made to up to 3 architects offices.
If the owner selects a time when the meeting is possible, the architects will see it and accept the available schedule.
Ola planners will help coordinate the final meeting schedule and keep the meeting on schedule.
label.contract_title:
Did you decide on an architect through the meeting?
Please make a contract request to Ola.
label.contract_subtitle:
The contract between the owner and the architect is a contract that is concluded in two minutes, but
Ola's planner helps communication for the client who is unfamiliar with the design contract.
You can check the signed contract at any time on the owner's project page.
label.progress_complete_title:
Is the design in progress?
Check the progress and go through VR architecture
Meet my pre-built home in a virtual space.
label.progress_complete_subtitle:
You can check the progress of the project and the design process in My Project.
When the design is complete, you can see the results delivered by the architect and your building built in a virtual space in advance.
Now, meet in advance in our building around you and brag about it.
label.vr_architecture_title: How can I see VR architecture?
label.build_map:
In VR Building Maps
Choose the building you want to see.
label.build_map_desc: Select the building you like on the VR building map and enter the VR building.
label.inside_vr_map:
Inside the VR Architecture Map
using keyboard and mouse
Feel free to watch.
label.inside_vr_map_sub: ※ If you are connecting from a mobile device, you can operate it by hand.
label.inside_vr_map_desc: Select the building you like on the VR building map and enter the VR building.
label.video_use_guide: You can also check the video below for details on how to use it.
label.bid_amount_tooltip:
Bid Amount

The bid amount is determined by the architect. View the contents of the project and get a quote. This is the amount paid. Through a real meeting fluctuations may occur.
label.estimate_design_tooltip:
Estimated Design Period

The estimated design period depends on the size of the project. Roughly calculated through information such as period. Detailed through a real meeting. The period is calculated and in the expected period. Variation is possible.
label.portfolio_tooltip:
Portfolio

Submitted to Ola by the architect Portfolio. submitted. If you do not have a portfolio, you can request a portfolio.
label.meeting_tooltip:
Meeting Request

Meetings with architects participating in the bidding. Detailed direction and owner. You can decide whether you can proceed with. There is Meeting request is one project. You can do it up to 3 times.
label.help_bidding_tooltip:
Request a meeting

Please check the information submitted by the architects participating in the bid. You can check the bid amount, expected design period, portfolio, and quotation. If you apply for a meeting with the architect you want to hold the meeting, the meeting will be held after that.

Contract Request

After meeting with the architects who participated in the bid, did you find the architect you like? If you select the relevant architect's office and select Request a contract, the following procedure for the contract proceeds.
label.schedule_message: For a meeting with the architect, please select the method and schedule that the owner of the building wants. (Up to 3 meeting schedules can be selected.) If the architect confirms the available schedules among the selected schedules, the meeting schedule adjustment is completed.
label.meeting_request_completed: The meeting request has been completed.
label.ola_contact_for_meeting: We will contact you soon to guide you through the meeting.
label.meeting_up_to: It can be done up to 3 times.
label.register_company_information_mgs: If you register the necessary documents to proceed with Ola's various construction projects, you do not have to register the documents each time.
label.delete_business_license:
Registered business license
Do you want to delete?
label.registered_business_license:
Check the registered project
Take part in the bidding.
label.auth_request_completed: Your authentication request has been completed.
label.take_part_bidding:
Check the registered project
Take part in the bidding.
label.account_manage_mgs: Please register account information to receive payment for the project.
label.account_manage_guide:
[Account Management Guide]
An accurate account number is required for safe remittance of project funds.
label.account_manage_desc:
※ For personal accounts, please enter your date of birth.
For corporate accounts, please enter your business registration number.
label.client_look_architect: Currently, {{number}} clients are looking for architects.
label.bid_result_title: Check the bidding results of the projects you participated in the bidding.
label.bidding_success_msg:
Your bid application has been successfully completed.
The owner has not yet requested a meeting/contract with the bidder.
label.bidding_fail_msg:
Unfortunately, this bid was not successful.
Try again in Ola's various projects.
label.owner_requested_meeting: The owner requested a meeting with the architect.
label.accept_meeting_msg:
You have accepted the meeting schedule.
We will contact you soon to inform you about the meeting.
label.coordinating_meeting_msg: You have accepted the meeting schedule. Ola is coordinating the meeting.
label.coordinating_meeting_complete_msg: The architect's meeting schedule has been adjusted.
label.review_contract_msg:
The owner of the building requested the architect to proceed with the contract.
Regarding the contract process, Ola will guide you through the review and conclusion of the contract.
label.review_contract_msg2:
After receiving the guidance, review the details of the contract with the owner
Once the review is complete, the contract will be signed.
label.contract_fail_msg: Unfortunately, this bid was not successful.
label.contract_fail_msg2: Try again in Ola's various projects.
label.project_working: Check out the projects the architect is working on.
label.project_been_working: This is a project that an architect has been working on at Ola.
label.project_interested: This is a project that architects are interested in. Hurry up and bid!
label.no_detail_client_request: You did not fill out a separate request.
label.smooth_bid_message: Please refer to the guide below for smooth bidding.
label.check_project_information_txt:
Have you checked all the information about the project?
Please carefully check the requirements the client wants on the project screen.
label.to_bid_txt:
Click the [Bid Project] button to bid on the project.
On the bidding page, fill in the required information and submit to complete the bid.
label.bidding_result_txt:
After all bids have been completed, you can check the results of the projects you participated in the bid in [My Projects].
For projects that have received bid results, please check the results in “Checking Results”.
label.bidding_quote_txt: Please attach an estimate for design cost calculation. Estimates can be registered in Excel format.
label.no_portfolio_message:
There is no registered portfolio yet.
Please register your portfolio.
label.update_design_progress_msg1: Please update the progress of the design project you are working on.
label.update_design_progress_msg2: The updated content will be shared with the building owner.
label.register_your_design_msg:
Is the design complete?
If you register the design result, Ola will allow the owner to check the result.
When registering a performance product, please upload all the contents that must be provided according to the contract standards.
label.progress_tooltip:
After changing the progress status to completed,
additional status changes are impossible.
Please be careful when processing completion.
label.billing_tooltip:
According to the terms and conditions of the contract,
the request button is activated when submitting the product.
label.well_done_architect_msg:
If you register the completed design achievements,
We will pass it on to the owner so that the review can proceed.
label.amount_cost_based_on_contract: The amount of the cost based on the contract.
label.contract_request_owner_info: Contract Request Information from the owner
label.project_design_txt_1: As the design progresses, you can check the progress indicated by the architect for the completed stage.
label.project_design_txt_2: If you have registered the results for each design stage, you can view the results.
label.vr_waiting_msg: The VR construction has not been completed yet.For inquiries about the schedule and progress, please contact the customer center.
label.complete_bid_txt_1: To see a list of projects that architects have participated in bidding
label.complete_bid_txt_2: You can check it by clicking More My Projects at the bottom.
